summary: The Department of Transportation's Mega program funds large, complex projects that are likely to generate economic, mobility, or safety benefits nationally or regionally. Mega projects include highways, bridges, and intercity transit and passenger rail. DOT awarded $1.12 billion in FY22 for such projects. Specifically, highway-bridge projects received 7 of 9 awards. The others funded transit and intercity rail projects. But as with some other DOT...
title: Transportation Grants: Implementation of Recommendations to Improve Documentation Would Enhance Program for Large, Complex Projects
